page.title: 18Occupations.
page.content: One hundred years ago, occupations in this area related to the cotton trade, farming and quarrying. Today the main occupations are mainly professional, dentists, solicitors, accountants, insurance brokers. The main occupation seems to be in engineering management,shop and market traders,Policemen and Managers. Mothers are mainly housewives, but the chief occupations are Teachers,Nurses and Officeworkers. Many have part-time jobs, such as Dinner ladies. Many children in this area attend privatye schools, moving into private school at age 8 or 11, at Day Schools in Cheshire, Manchester and Oldham.
